Name: Earth Marines
About the game: We left Earth many years ago, when the dangerous infection turned humanity into bloodthirsty zombies who are only happy to eat brains! On the spaceships, we waited and prepared. We were preparing to bring the Earth back! And now the Earth Landing Party is at your service! Four brave warriors will show who is who! Choose a character, land on the planet, search for weapons and ammunition, fight off zombies, complete tasks, try to do everything for survive. Features of the game: - cartoon graphics - cool characters - an invigorating soundtrack - dynamic challenging gameplay
